description:
Historical to near future coupled ocean atmosphere simulations (1950-2050) with fixed 1950s forcing at high and standard resolution.
For optimal comparison between models aerosol concentrations would be preferable and not emissions.
At least one ensemble member at high resolution, minimum atmosphere 25-50 km at mid-latitudes and ocean resolution of 0.25 degrees, and a minimum of daily coupling between ocean and atmosphere.
At least one ensemble member at standard model resolution.
long_name: coupled control with fixed 1950's forcing (HighResMIP equivalent of pre-industrial control)

requirements.description: Historical Scenario, from recent past to near future.
requirements.keywords: 1950, 2049, Historical, Scenario, Recent Past, Near Future
requirements.label: 1950-2049 100yrs

requirements.description:
1950 Forcing data for concentration-driven historical CMIP6 runs. Here, we provide an outline of a consolidated set of atmospheric concentrations for the long-lived greenhouse-gases, including CO2, CH4, N2O, HFCs, PFCs, SF6, several ODS, and NF3 to serve as input for the CMIP6 Historical simulations. 
Depending on the model setup and emission species (short-lived, ozone, long-lived GHG), the historical simulation is driven by emissions and/or concentrations.
requirements.keywords: Historical, Well Mixed Greenhouse Gas, WMGHG, 1950
requirements.label: 1950 WMGHG Concentrations

requirements.description: 1950 global gridded land-use forcing datasets.  This new generation of “land use harmonization” (LUH2) builds upon past work from CMIP5, and includes updated inputs, higher spatial resolution, more detailed land-use transitions, and the addition of important agricultural management layers.
requirements.label: 1950 Land Use

requirements.description: Mass mixing ratio fields at 1x1 degree resolution for 1950 main aerosol components (sulphate, black carbon, organic carbon, nitrate, sea salt, mineral dust),  along with effective radius per species.
requirements.label: 1950 Aerosol Forcing

requirements.description: 1950 solar forcing of the Earth system consistent with historical observations.
requirements.keywords: 1950, Solar, Forcing, SSI, TSI, Proton Forcing, Electron Forcing
requirements.label: 1950 Solar Forcing

requirements.description: 1950 ozone concentration data encompassing both the stratosphere and the troposphere and a stratospheric water vapour concentration data.
requirements.keywords: 1950, stratospheric, ozone, water vapour, O3, H2O, concentration
requirements.label: 1950 O3 and Stratospheric H2O Concentrations

requirements.description: At least two simulations, one at high resolution (minimum 25-50 km at mid-latitudes), and one at the standard model resolution
requirements.keywords: high resolution, standard resolution, at least two members
requirements.label: HighAndStandardResolution

requirements.description: Use a coupled Atmosphere-Ocean general circulation model or an Earth System Model
requirements.keywords: AOGCM, ESM, Atmosphere-Ocean, Earth System, Model, Configuration
requirements.label: AOGCM/ESM Configuration

requirements.description: Minimum daily coupling between ocean and atmosphere.  Preferably more frequent, 3hr or 1hr.
requirements.label: DailyCoupling
